testcase.name: CompanyDetails > Loading State > should display loading state initially
CompanyDetails > Company Information Display > should display company details correctly
CompanyDetails > Company Information Display > should handle company without NZBN
CompanyDetails > Directors Section > should display directors list correctly
CompanyDetails > Directors Section > should display "no directors" message when no directors exist
CompanyDetails > Directors Section > should show appoint director button when authenticated
CompanyDetails > Directors Section > should not show appoint director button when not authenticated
CompanyDetails > Directors Section > should show resign button for active directors when authenticated
CompanyDetails > Directors Section > should not show resign button for resigned directors
CompanyDetails > Navigation > should navigate to director appointment page when appoint button is clicked
CompanyDetails > Navigation > should navigate to director resignation page when resign button is clicked
CompanyDetails > Error Handling > should display error message when company loading fails
CompanyDetails > Error Handling > should display error message when directors loading fails
CompanyDetails > Error Handling > should handle missing company ID when neither prop nor param is provided
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should display shareholders list correctly
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should display shareholder addresses correctly
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should display share allocations with correct details
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should show register shareholder button when authenticated
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should not show register shareholder button when not authenticated
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should show transfer buttons for authenticated users
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should not show transfer buttons when not authenticated
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should display "no shareholders" message when no shareholders exist
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should handle navigation to register shareholder page
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should handle navigation to share transfer page
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should handle shareholders loading error gracefully
CompanyDetails > Shareholders Section > should calculate ownership percentages correctly with multiple allocations
CompanyDetails > Props Override > should use prop companyId when provided
